name: Mineveinia
description:
In order to settle his debts, our brave hero must venture deep in order to find precious magic ore. Unfortunately, things aren't so simple, and he might end up using a lot more ore than he'd like!

===================

How to play:
A/D = Move left and right
Space = Jump
E = Interact
Mouse = Aim
Left Click = Mine / Attack
Esc = Pause / Unpause

===================

Mineveinia is an experimental take on the well-loved Metroidvania genre. Unlike most of its kind, the player gets to decide which powerup they'd prefer to obtain first, and the game is balanced around that freedom of choice.
